Title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson: The Treasures of Agra
Actors: Vasiliy Livanov, Vitali Solomin, Rina Zelyonaya, Borislav Brondukov
Plot: Holmes and Dr. Watson help a young lady who is receiving anonymous letters 10 years after her father passed away under shady circumstances. They find themselves in an enigma involving a treasure, murder and a love interest for Watson.
